duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct behavioral, surgical, and physiological experiments on mice with supervision.
Assist with lab maintenance, reagent preparation, ordering, inventory, and general animal care.
Perform regulatory work, including assisting with animal protocol generation and modification under supervision.
Follow pre-defined protocols, policies, procedures, and regulations for experiments.
Set-up, operate, and maintain lab equipment.
Record test results, analyze data, and keep records of work completed.
Maintain inventory of reagents, mice, and lab supplies.
Order reagents and mice, assist with animal protocol amendments.

education_certification.credential: HS diploma or equivalent and basic science courses. Bachelor’s degree in neuroscience, biology, or related area preferred.
